languages.text:
Ваш персонаж подвергся {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативному эффекту{/g}!
Под воздействием негативных {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g} возможности персонажей более ограничены — негативные эффекты ухудшают {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} сражаться, проходить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} и использовать оружие или предметы.
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель инициативы слева, и выберите персонажа, чтобы посмотреть список его статусов. В описании негативного эффекта можно узнать, как долго он длится и каким образом можно от него избавиться.
Если вы хотите изучить описание подробнее, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
Ваш персонаж подвергся негативному эффекту!
Под водействием негативных эффектов возможности персонажей более ограничены — это может сказываться на их способности сражаться, проходить проверки или использовать оружие или предметы.
Нажмите { console_bind | ???}, чтобы активировать панель трекера хода слева и выберите персонажа, чтобы посмотреть список его статусов.
Если вы хотите изучить описание подробней, удерживайте { console_bind | RightStickButton}

languages.text:
Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}'s description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
Ваш персонаж подвергся {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативному эффекту{/g}!
Под воздействием негативных {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g} возможности персонажей более ограничены — негативные эффекты ухудшают {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} сражаться, проходить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} и использовать оружие или предметы.
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель инициативы слева, и выберите персонажа, чтобы посмотреть список его статусов. В описании негативного эффекта можно узнать, как долго он длится и каким образом можно от него избавиться.
Если вы хотите изучить описание подробнее, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
Your character is afflicted with a negative effect!
Such effects can hinder a character's ability to fight, pass tests, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative effect's description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

Your character is afflicted with a negative effect!
Such effects can hinder a character's ability to fight, pass tests, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative effect's description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}'s description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
¡Tu personaje sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g}!
Este tipo de {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectos{/g} puede hacer mella en las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} ofensivas, la superación de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} y el uso de armas u objetos de un personaje.
Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}iniciativa{/g} a la izquierda y elige un personaje para ver sus efectos actuales. La descripción de un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} negativo puede ayudarte a descubrir la duración de su efecto y el modo de deshacerte de él.
Para leer detenidamente su descripción, pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}'s description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
¡Tu personaje sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g}!
Este tipo de efectos puede hacer mella en las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} ofensivas, la superación de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} y el uso de armas u objetos de un personaje.
Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de iniciativa a la izquierda y elige un personaje para ver sus efectos actuales. La descripción de un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} negativo puede ayudarte a descubrir la duración de su efecto y el modo de deshacerte de él.
Para leer detenidamente su descripción, pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を受けている！
このような{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は、キャラクターの戦闘における{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}の成功、武器やアイテムの使用を妨げることがある。
{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して左側の{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}イニシアチブ{/g}パネルを起動し、キャラクターを選択して現在どのような効果を受けているかを確認する。マイナス{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の説明は、その効果がどれくらいの期間続くのか、どうすればそれを取り除くことができるのかを理解するのに役立つ。
説明文の詳細を読むには、{console_bind|Confirm} を押す。

Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}'s description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}を受けている！
このような効果は、キャラクターの戦闘における{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}の合格、武器やアイテムの使用を妨げることがある。
{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して左側のイニシアチブパネルを起動し、キャラクターを選択して現在どのような効果を受けているかを確認する。マイナス{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の説明は、その効果がどれくらいの期間続くのか、どうすればそれを取り除くことができるのかを理解するのに役立つ。
説明文の詳細を読むには、{console_bind|Confirm} を押す。

languages.text:
您的角色受到了{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}影响！
这种{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}会干扰角色的战斗能力，在{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}中带来减值，或干扰角色使用武器或物品。
按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}激活左边的行动顺序面板，之后选择任意角色，即可查看该名角色当前受到的影响。通过负面{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}的描述文本，您可以看到该效果的剩余时间，以及可以通过哪些方式消除这些效果。
若想了解详细内容，请按下{console_bind|Confirm}。
languages.original_text:
Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}'s description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
您的角色受到了{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}影响！
这种效果会干扰角色的战斗能力，在{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}中带来减值，或干扰角色使用武器或物品。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}
按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}激活左边的行动顺序面板，之后选择任意角色，即可查看该名角色当前受到的影响。通过负面{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}的描述文本，您可以看到该效果的剩余时间，以及可以通过哪些方式消除这些效果。
若想了解详细内容，请按{console_bind|Confirm}。

languages.text:
Dein Charakter ist mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} belegt!
Solche {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekte{/g} können die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Charakters beeinträchtigen zu kämpfen, {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} zu schaffen oder Waffen und Gegenstände zu benutzen.
Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Initiative{/g}-Fenster auf der linken Seite zu aktivieren und wähle einen Charakter aus, um zu sehen, welche Effekte er gerade hat. Die Beschreibung eines negativen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} kann dir dabei helfen zu verstehen, wie lange der Effekt anhält und wie du ihn vielleicht loswerden kannst.
Um die Beschreibung im Detail zu lesen, drücke {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}'s description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
Dein Charakter ist mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativen Effekt{/g} belegt!
Solche Effekte können die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Charakters beeinträchtigen zu kämpfen, {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} zu schaffen oder Waffen und Gegenstände zu benutzen.
Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das Initiative-Panel auf der linken Seite zu aktivieren und wähle einen Charakter aus, um zu sehen, welche Effekte er gerade hat. Die Beschreibung eines negativen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} kann dir dabei helfen zu verstehen, wie lange der Effekt anhält und wie du ihn vielleicht loswerden kannst.
Um die Beschreibung im Detail zu lesen, drücke {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
Votre personnage est sous le coup d'un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g}!
Ces {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} peuvent entraver la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un personnage à se battre, à réussir les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} ou à utiliser des armes ou des objets.
Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}d'initiative{/g} de gauche et sélectionnez un personnage pour savoir quels {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effets{/g} lui sont actuellement appliqués. La description d'un effet négatif vous permet de connaître sa durée et de déterminer comment vous pouvez vous en débarrasser.
Pour lire la description plus en détail, appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}'s description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
Votre personnage est sous le coup d'un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} !
Ces effets peuvent entraver la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un personnage à se battre, à réussir les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} ou à utiliser des armes ou des objets.
Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau d'initiative de gauche et sélectionnez un personnage pour connaître les effets dont il fait l’objet. La description d'un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} négatif peut vous aider à comprendre la durée de l'effet et comment vous en débarrasser.
Pour lire la description plus en détail, appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}.
